apps.title: Home Design 3D: Draw & Plan
apps.description: HOME DESIGN 3D - CREATE YOUR DREAM HOUSE IN 3D Create your dream house design with the world's leading home design app, trusted by over 60 million users in more than 150 countries. Transform your house design idea into stunning reality with our ultimate 3D house designer, featuring an intuitive planner and immersive 3D. Perfect for interior design, construction preparation, and rapid iterations across every design space, from concept to completion. PLAN & DESIGN YOUR DREAM HOME IN 3D • Draw floor plans in 2D, then instantly view in immersive 3D and 5D perspectives • Professional house designer tools for precise construction measurements • Create multi-story home renovation design projects with unlimited floors • Adjust wall thickness, height & angles for accurate planning • Map your entire house from ground to rooftop across every design space FURNISH & DECORATE EVERY SPACE • Browse thousands of items to decorate living rooms, kitchens, bedrooms & gardens • Customize furniture size, color & placement in each design space • Save multiple versions for easy comparison - redesign entire rooms instantly • Redecor entire rooms instantly and compare different styles in seconds • Test layouts with our advanced planner before starting your home renovation • Professional interior design tools with fine-tuned lighting & palettes • Perfect room planner for decorating and interior design projects VISUALIZE & WALK THROUGH • Photorealistic 3D rendering - walk through your dream house as if you were there • Experience your Home Design in 5D through virtual reality with VR export • Day/Night slider to preview natural lighting in every design space • Real-time 3D exploration of your house design and construction plans IMPORT ANY HOUSE DESIGN • Import existing projects and blueprints and draw directly on top • Import custom textures to personalize and decorate every design space with unique materials • Draw a floor plan in 2D and explore it instantly in 3D from your imported plans COLLABORATE, SHARE AND EXPORT • Keep a private design space library & share selected rooms once ready • Export projects across devices and collaborate with other house designers • Publish to our community, get decorating tips, feedback on your house design, redecor and iterate • Share your architecture projects via email, Dropbox, OneDrive • Share your creations with the Home Design 3D community on www.homedesign3d.net • Cross-platform compatibility so you can continue projects on any device MADE FOR EVERY HOME CREATOR • All-in-one planner for construction, remodeling & interior design • Streamlined workflow for interior design and construction planning • Intuitive design tool for beginners and professional house designers • Freedom to decorate, redesign, and refine every design space • From studio apartments to villas — design any house project WHY MILLIONS CHOOSE HOME DESIGN 3D • FAST START: Draw in 2D, switch to 3D, and iterate in seconds • PRO TOOLS: Accurate walls, angles & dimensions for real construction work • DESIGN FREEDOM: Endless furniture, materials & palettes to decorate • LIVE WALKTHROUGHS: Explore your house design in real-time 3D and 5D • SMART WORKFLOWS: Advanced room planner, landscape planner & lighting tools • HOME MAKEOVER: Redecor entire rooms instantly and compare styles in seconds. • GLOBAL COMMUNITY: Connect with professional and amateur house designers worldwide Works offline | No internet required Illustrated tutorial included USER REVIEWS “Made my home design decisions easy. I could decorate rooms and preview in 3D before buying.” — “Great for interior design and construction planning — the planner saved me time and money.” — Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula Privacy Policy: https://en.homedesign3d.net/privacy-policy Twitter: @homedesign3d Facebook: facebook.com/homedesign3d Pinterest: boards/homedesign3d Instagram: @homedesign3d_off

apps.title: My Home - Design Dreams
apps.description: Welcome to My Home, a place that you can make your dream come true! Play this fun addictive match 3 game and make your dream home-design FOR FREE! From a condo to a mansion or even a villa, you can design and decorate everything on your device by your fingertips! Enjoy the game that fuses colorful matching puzzle levels with a home you restore, makeover and decorate. Many free styles and furniture combinations await you in-game! Don't forget to stop by your landlord or best friend's house to catch up and talk about your dream! Come and download to design your home for free now! Game features: * House Design: Open-ended addictive puzzle gameplay. Various styles at your disposal! Makeover and restore your houses all by yourself! * Exciting match 3 levels: Hundreds of challenging match-3 levels with many awesome boosters. More matching challenging means more fun! * Personalized storyline: All stories focus on YOU! Follow along with the adventure while designing your dream homes! * Vivid characters: Fun and unique characters! Your best friend, your sweet landlord and many more surprises! * Multiple houses: Not satisfied with designing and restoring only one house? We have plenty of houses for you to design and decorate! Challenge the match 3 puzzle levels Now! Time to show your talent for home-design in-game! Take the reins and bring your dream house to life now for free! Wanna get all the latest information? Join our worldwide community on: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyHomeMyDreams Need some help? Contact our support via in-game settings or send us an email at myhome@zentertain.net.

apps.title: Homematch - Home Design Games
apps.description: Ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own home design studio? Now you can with TapBlaze’s newest home design game, Homematch! Do your best to satisfy your client's design request while staying true to your interior decorator intuition. Become the master homematcher of your neighborhood... your city... your country ... your world! Solve match 3 puzzle levels and unlock hundreds of new decor items to help your clients create their dream home makeover! The final makeover design is entirely up to you! FEATURES * 1,000s of different home decor makeover items * Unique homes, rooms, houses and clients * Cute story and relaxing gameplay * Home design game with match 3 puzzle challenges * Unlock rewards as you polish your design skills as an interior designer * Frequent, free updates with new design challenges, seasonal events and more From cozy living rooms to elegant bedrooms, chic dining areas, rooftop gardens, gourmet kitchens, luxurious bedrooms, and refreshing backyard pools, unleash your home design games style while renovating without getting your hands dirty. Download and start your home makeover journey now! Privacy Policy: http://www.tapblaze.com/about/privacy-policy/ Terms of Service: http://www.tapblaze.com/about/terms-conditions/

apps.title: My Home Design - Modern City
apps.description: Welcome to Modern City! Your new favorite home design game set against a stunning NYC background. Take this chance to work side by side with star interior designer Chloe Williams and her business partner Liam Gold. From successful career women to newlywed couples to families, clients are on their way to meet Chloe and Liam right now! Help them design trendy kitchens, cozy living rooms, relaxing bedrooms and more to live the life of their dreams! Solve fun match-3 puzzles to collect coins and use them to select furniture, decor items and more! These lucky clients have very different personalities, needs and ideas but they have one thing in common: They all have high expectations for you to design an amazing home! Can you help them create spaces to relax, enjoy and spend quality time? Because after all a house without character is just a house. Help your clients to turn these houses into sweet designer homes. It's not going to be easy. You'll have to work and play your way up from the bottom, makeover different rooms and places to become a real designer and put a smile on your clients' faces. Do you have what it takes to remodel, decorate and furbish dream homes and become a household name in the home design game world? Here's how to do it: Meet interior designer Chloe and Liam. Couples, singles and families, all kinds of clients are waiting for you! Design, renovate, remodel kitchens, living rooms, bedrooms and more in Modern City! Choose furniture and decor according to your style and preferences. Simply tap to decorate and create trendy places in the city. Exciting and addictive Match-3 puzzle games! Play puzzles to collect coins and use them to create your perfect home design! Enjoy witty and fun conversations among interior designers and clients! Express yourself and nurture your interior design skills! Plus, find inspiration for your own home makeover! Play for free and offline! New episodes and match-3 puzzle levels coming out soon! Are you into the city life? Guam, Hawaii and the Caribbean won't do the trick for you? Come to NYC and play Modern City! Find inspiration, collect high-quality furniture, and decorate with enchanting colors and patterns. Build and design homes and make dreams come true in this match-3 puzzle and home design game! Create a home you'll never want to leave! *Please note that [ Modern City ] saves your progress on your device. Data will be reset if you delete the app or change your device.* ------------------------------------------------ DEVELOPER INFO Are you into home design? Puzzle games? CookApps Playgrounds fan? Join us on Facebook for fun stuff and news about your favorite games! https://www.facebook.com/StudioPlaygrounds

apps.title: Design Lab・Logo・Graphics Maker
apps.description: Create beautiful designs and pro graphics with DesignLab! Choose from millions of images, fonts and templates to produce stunning visuals, perfect for social media. FEATURES: • CUSTOMIZABLE TEMPLATES Search & select from our famous library of thousands of professionally designed templates. Organize them into customizable folders with our favoriting tool. • PHOTO FILTERS & ADJUSTMENTS Choose from our collection of filters to get the look you desire. Finely tune your photos with our suite of photo adjustments, including brightness, contrast, exposure, saturation, blur & more. • ADVANCED TEXT TOOLS Easily add multiple text layers, controlling their size, positioning, opacity, rotation, kerning, leading & color. You can also curve, bend, erase, and apply 3D transformations. • GORGEOUS ARTWORK DesignLab comes jam-packed with hundreds of irresistibly gorgeous illustrations, decorative ornaments, and design elements. • FREE STOCK PHOTOGRAPHY Search from a collection of millions of free stock photos & illustrations. • LAYER-BASED EDITING Tap the layer menu to select one or multiple layers to edit. You can also rearrange their orders by long-tapping and dragging to the desired position. • CUSTOM ARTWORK Import custom artwork or your own logo, and use it in your photos as a fully editable layer. Perfect for the mobile creative, it helps branding efforts everywhere. • BLEND & ERASE TOOLS Erase parts of your artwork, text, or imported photo layers & apply several different blend modes to create unique images. There is also a built in "focus mode" - which allows for great precision when the eraser is active. • SHAPES Create vector shapes and control their properties with ease. • CROP TOOL Choose from a variety of aspect ratios. ...and more! Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the time of purchase confirmation. Subscription renews automatically unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase. apps.title: House Designer : Fix & Flip
apps.description: Play House Designer: Fix and Flip today - a fun simulator game of house renovation where you can realize all your home design fantasies into reality. Try yourself in the role of house flipper. Interior designer Do you like interior design? In House Designer you can buy a house and do experiments with home design and express your creativity in it. There is a lot of selection of house furniture, beds, chairs, tables, bath and kitchen furniture, painting and other decor items. Upgrade your skills and polish your amazing abilities as an interior decorator. Buy, Fix & Flip Buy devastated houses, repair them and upgrade their design. Give them a second life and live in them or sell with profit. Earn a fortune in house flipping. Renovate work Perform tasks for cleaning and designing houses and other interesting locations. Download House Designer: Fix and flip and become the best house flipper and designer of the county! Premium subscription. Enjoy the game and get bonuses: 1. 20% discount on in-game items 2. Pay for work 50% higher 3. More varied jobs Make your life easier with premium access: - Check it's advantages, by getting a free three-day trial. After 3 days, the trial will automatically turn to the week paid subscription. - The paid subscription is divided into the 3 types: weekly, monthly and yearly. - A week paid subscription costs $7.99. Month - $19.99. Year - $99.99. - Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. - You can cancel the subscription or a free trial at any time, but at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. OTHERWISE, it will be automatically renewed. - The account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. - You can manage the subscription and turn off the auto-renewal in your Account Settings after purchase. - Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited when you purchase the subscription. - Read our privacy policy and Terms of Use http://karategoosestudio.com/ You can always write on e-mail of our studio about your problem and we will certainly consider your application. Mail for communication: karategoosestudio@gmail.com

apps.title: Design Dream Home
apps.description: Welcome to Design Home, a game where your dream come true! Be the best designer and help Mary to transform her new apartment into her dream home! Solve fun match 3 puzzles, design and decorate the perfect home. Choose between many furniture combinations and decor to makeover rooms. Follow the interesting story between Mary and her landlord Jimmy. Features: * Remodel rooms with a classic or modern style! * Play match 3 game with exciting levels and awesome boosters! * Follow the story line and find out the story between Mary and her landlord! * Express yourself by furnishing home with high-end furniture, lightning, flooring and other decor! Start matching and transform the empty apartment into a fabulous home!

apps.title: Garden Joy: Design Game
apps.description: Design gardens and style patios of beautiful homes. Choose from decor to exotic flowers and plants in the #1 Outdoor Design Game. In this cozy landscaping and gardening simulation, you will: - Design the perfect home garden, terrace or patio - Grow hundreds of flowers & plants for your designs - Express yourself in garden-makeover challenges - Play the game and trees will be planted in the real world! - Learn fun and interesting facts about plants - Relax in a cozy home landscaping game - Pick from an array of stylish furniture for your designs - Collect seeds packs and trade them to grow your plants collection! Become a creative landscaper Dive into the landscaping world to turn home gardens into havens with Garden Joy – the ultimate virtual gardening game. Leave interior design to embrace the great outdoors! Play your cards right to transform a house yard into the garden of your dreams. It’s time to give a complete landscape makeover to outdoor spaces! Grow your collection Collect and grow plants, trees, flowers or bushes with seed packs. Trade the seeds packs to enrich your collection of plants. Collect stylish outdoor furniture such as sofa, bench, parasol, coffee table, etc. Be creative with your collection to design and decorate the garden of countless houses and homey residencies, make’em look royal! Redecorate many house gardens As a landscaping and home design aficionado, your mission is to decorate the garden of various houses, from beach houses to English cottages, Mediterranean villas to mountain chalets. Use your senses for interior design to beautify outdoor spaces. New challenges are added every day! It’s a complete makeover! Use your creativity and your collection of plants and furniture to come up with the best landscaping design of your life! Find the best match to design the gardens of your dreams. Team up in multiplayer events. Partner with up to 3 people for limited-time events to create stunning bouquets. Use the flower tokens from completing challenges to build these beautiful floral arrangements. The more tokens collected, the bigger the bouquet, the greater the rewards! Additionally, seasonal events will allow you to cooperate with other players. Protect our planet earth Because ecology and preservation of the ecosystem matters more now than ever, you can do your part while playing Garden Joy. Garden Joy and One Tree Planted come together in this an eco-friendly game to give you the option to plant real trees just by playing the game. Learn about the plants Learn real details about flowers, plants, and trees while decorating. How much water, or sunlight do they need? Where do they originate from? Plants will no longer keep any secret from you. Share with the world Showcase your latest garden makeover projects and receive valuable feedback from fellow landscapers through voting. Do your magic! It's time to inspire dreams with all the plant gatherings you've been doing! Your friends will have no words when they see your work. Design like a Pro Better Homes & Gardens branded challenges are here! From the authority on all things design and gardening, help sharpen your design chops and creativity by designing gorgeous gardens around the world using fabulous decor and amazing flora! ---- If you like cozy games and interior design games, Garden Joy will be the breath of fresh air you need! Unlock your inner designer with Garden Joy! Bring your outdoor design dreams to life as you decorate terraces, plant and collect new flowers, discover new furniture, and create heavenly garden designs for your dream home. Garden Joy is a realistic lifestyle simulation featuring endless makeover possibilities. Craft charming garden designs and learn about plants with the in-game encyclopedia and contribute to saving the Earth while you play.

apps.title: VanillaPen: Design Studio
apps.description: VanillaPen is a powerful design studio that will transform your ideas into professional-grade artwork without the need of prior design experience. VanillaPen’s comprehensive libraries - over 1 million elements - are powered with a set of advanced editing tools and a seamless workflow that makes your design process a piece of butterscotch walnut cake. Whether you need to design a story, post, collage, album artwork, movie poster, website header, business card, invitation, book cover, Ad and more, Vanillapen got you covered. — We’re extremely excited to announce VanillaPen Premium! Vanillapen Premium comes with a 7 day free trial and is offered as a $4.99 monthly subscription or a $49.99 annual subscription. — Price may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will not be able to cancel the subscription once activated. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase. — Privacy policy http://www.roadrocks.com/privacy-policy/ Terms and conditions http://www.roadrocks.com/terms/ Have questions, suggestions or feedback? We love to hear from you! Reach out to us at RoadRocks.com or shoot us an email at contact@roadrocks.com

apps.title: Cricut Design Space
apps.description: Enjoy total creative freedom over your next DIY project with Cricut Design Space™. Design, cut, or draw by connecting to Cricut Explore™ or Cricut Maker™ machines. Start your project from scratch or browse thousands of images, ready-to-make projects, and unique fonts in the Cricut Image Library. Create from anywhere, any time inspiration sparks with cloud-based syncing across devices. Make the most of every last scrap with the SnapMat™ feature. Connect to your compatible Cricut cutting machine with a Bluetooth® connection. Experience brand-new features like kerning, spell check, right-to-left text & more by upgrading your device to iOS 14 or above. New to Cricut? Welcome! To use this companion Design Space app, first activate your new machine at cricut.com/setup Existing members with Cricut Joy™ machines? For fun or functional projects in 15 minutes or less, use the companion Cricut Joy™ app. Features: • Over 50,000 FREE images, fonts & projects • Upload & edit your own compatible image files (jpg, .bmp, .png, .gif, .svg, and .dxf) • Browse Cricut fonts or use your own system fonts • Cut predesigned Make It Now projects quickly & easily • Make cards, invitations, 3D models & more • Design home & party decor, jewelry, and fashion accessories • Get perfect cut settings for your material type • Visualize & position artwork on scrap material with SnapMat™ feature • Access images & projects and make purchases on cricut.com or Design Space with Cricut ID. • Setup & activate machine right from app • Bluetooth® capability (Bluetooth adapter may be required, sold separately) • Easily position, resize & rotate text • Kerning for fonts • Follow step-by-step project instructions • Ready-to-make mug designs • Auto-save projects Cricut Access: https://cricut.com/legal#terms-of-use

apps.title: Linearity Curve Graphic Design
apps.description: Vector drawing. Vector art. Graphic design. SVG. Vectorize in seconds. Linearity Curve is a modern vector drawing program and complete Graphic Design Software for iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Sketch with Apple Pencil, refine curves with Bézier tools, and use the built-in SVG converter to turn sketches or photos into clean, production-ready vector drawing format files. Whether you’re working on logos, icons, illustrations, UI assets, or social campaigns, Curve is the vector art program that gives you speed, precision, and control. ▶ Vector drawing & graphic design tools - Bézier Pen and Node tools for smooth, editable curves - Shape Builder, booleans, grids, and smart guides for clean layouts - Professional typography: kerning, tracking, variable fonts, OpenType features - Multiple artboards for logos, posters, UI visuals, and complete campaigns ▶ Vectorize & export with SVG converter - Auto Trace instantly vectorize sketches or images into editable paths - Export clean SVG drawing format with organized strokes, fills, and groups - PDFs for print, PNG/JPG for everywhere, plus built-in SVG converter tools - RGB & CMYK output for screen and print workflows ▶ Optimized for iOS 26 - Pencil-first vector drawing program: tilt, pressure, and gesture support - Seamless sync across iPhone, iPad & Mac with version history - Native Mac performance with Silicon acceleration - Full Liquid Glass interface on iOS 26 — a new era of design clarity and flow ▶ Start fast, finish polished - Thousands of ready-made templates for logos, posts, slides, and presentations - Built-in stock photos and vector illustration programs for faster starts - Tutorials and contextual tips to learn as you work ▶ Collaborate & share - Shared workspaces for real-time collaboration - Comments, versioning, and share links for team feedback ▶ Works with your files - Import and export industry formats (.ai, JPEG, SVG, PDF, PNG, JPG) - Export presets for apps, web, social, and print-ready assets - Import projects directly from popular design software like Illustrator, Figma, and Sketch with ease. ▶ Perfect for - Branding systems and logo design with Vector Design Software - Marketing graphics and visuals with vector design programs - Vector art program workflows for icons, illustrations, and infographics - Print-ready posters, brochures, and layouts with vector illustration programs - Digital products, UI assets, and professional graphic design software projects ▶ Why creators choose Curve - Clarity — a streamlined vector design software toolkit - Control — edit every node; curves stay crisp at any scale - Speed — instant SVG converter actions and smarter defaults - Continuity — sketch on iPad, refine on Mac, review on iPhone - Confidence — export clean vector drawing format files ▶ FAQ — quick answers Can I do vector drawing with Apple Pencil? Yes. Curve is optimized for tilt, pressure, and gestures so vector art feels natural. Can I vectorize images into SVG with an SVG converter? Yes. Auto Trace is a built-in SVG converter that creates editable paths for clean SVG export. Is this a vector art program or full Graphic Design Software? Both. Curve is a vector drawing program that scales into professional Graphic Design Software. Does it support vector illustration programs? Yes. Curve is one of the most versatile vector illustration programs, built for icons, logos, and layouts. Can I design offline? Yes. Work offline and sync when you reconnect. Will my SVG exports be clean? Yes. Exports preserve structure, groups, and geometry for production-ready vector drawing format. Does it support CMYK for print? Yes. Work in RGB or CMYK and export press-ready files. ▶Questions or feedback? Reach out at support@linearity.io Privacy policy: linearity.io/privacy-policy Follow us: YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram, X & TikTok (@linearityhq).

apps.title: Figma
apps.description: Collaborate on the go. View, share, and mirror designs with just a few taps. With Figma’s official mobile app, you can: REVIEW YOUR FILES * Access Figma, FigJam, Prototype and Slides files. * Quickly search for files by name or browse your recently viewed files. * Navigate between pages and flows in any file. CREATE AND REPLY TO COMMENTS * Add comments and mention teammates anywhere in a file. * Get notified for new comments and replies. * Resolve and respond to comments on the go. * View a list of all comment threads in a file. SHARE FILES WITH YOUR TEAM * Invite collaborators and share links to your files. PLAY YOUR PROTOTYPES * Play and replay prototypes in full screen. * Adjust prototype scaling. * Toggle hotspot hints. MIRROR DESIGNS IN REAL-TIME * Sync selected frames from desktop to your mobile device. * Watch real-time edits to your designs on your mobile device. * Preview how assets in your design look scaled to a device screen. EXPLORE SLIDES EFFORTLESSLY * View and comment on decks in both landscape and portrait mode. MANAGE PERMISSIONS ON THE FLY * Update file permissions to control who can view or edit your work. BROWSE AND SWITCH WORKSPACES * Navigate between teams, plans, and projects tied to your account. On iPad, you can also use FigJam to: * Sketch with the Apple Pencil to explore and iterate on ideas more fluidly. * Share and riff on early thinking with your team. * Annotate designs to share feedback. * Jot down ideas whenever inspiration strikes.

apps.title: Lily’s Garden: Match & Design
apps.description: Romance? Garden? Puzzles? YES! Lily’s Garden is all this and so much more. Renovate the garden and solve challenging puzzles with this new relaxing and romantic FREE match-3 blast game! Help Lily renovate her great-aunt’s garden to its former glory and match flowers to solve challenging blast puzzles. Dig into a romantic love story full of twists and turns as Lily interacts with a cast of colorful characters. Match flowers & start your garden makeover – play with themed boosters & renovate the areas with dozens of customizations options! Discover hidden areas and choose among hundreds of flowers for your decoration project! Sit down, relax and enjoy this puzzle game enriched with a beautiful romantic story! Start your makeover now! Features: - RENOVATE, decorate and expand your garden with unique locations that tie into the story! - MATCH flowers and solve hundreds of addictive blast puzzle levels! - ENJOY plot twists in the story and uncover hidden secrets and mysteries along the way! - EXPLORE the garden with its hidden objects, dozens of flowers and unlock hidden areas - RELAX and live a romantic story with funny and heartfelt dialogue! Flowers are blossoming and Lily’s garden is ready for its makeover! Are you ready to decorate and renovate this beautiful garden? Lily’s Garden will be updated with more blast puzzles to solve and more romantic chapters regularly! Already played and enjoyed the game? Stay tuned for updates and drop us a review! apps.title: FLYP - Fashion Design Studio
apps.description: FLYP is the fashion design app built for creators. Design, launch, and sell custom clothing with no upfront costs, no inventory, and no limits on creativity. Whether you're starting your own brand or just want to make some personalized clothing - FLYP gives you the tools to bring your ideas to life. apps.title: Morpholio Trace - Sketch CAD
apps.description: SKETCH, DESIGN, CREATE Trace is the ALL-IN-ONE design & architecture app. Awarded “Best App,” Trace is a truly unique drawing tool that allows you to easily develop ideas in layers, communicate via drawing markup, and work fluidly through ALL phases of the design process. Ideal for architects, interior designers, landscape architects, industrial designers, urban planners, lighting designers, engineers, or members of any creative culture, Trace lets you create intelligent sketches & drawings to meet all of your design needs. Draw on top of images, PDFs, maps, photos, drawing sets, 3D models, background templates, and more TO SCALE using exceptional designer tools, brushes and pens. Bring new life to your design process and transform your workflow with the ease, flexibility and the magic of digital hand sketching. ______________ THINGS YOU CAN DO: DESIGN • Develop ideas, options & concepts • Sketch buildings & objects • Layout home, office & landscape renovations MARKUP • Drawing sets & PDFs • Construction site photos • Presentations, renderings or images DRAW • Floor plans, sections & elevations to scale • Site plans & landscaping • Illustrations & presentation images WORK • Make & export drawing sets • Scale & measure drawings or images • Organize by project ______________ FREE FEATURES INCLUDE: -Up to 5 Projects -Basic Pens & Brushes -Layers -Layer Manager -Scale Pen -Paper Unbound -Export Images, PDFs or Sets -Sketch Recording -Instant Scale -Scale Ruler -Color Palette Maker PLUS SUBSCRIPTION FEATURES Also Includes -All Basic Features -Full Pens & Brushes -Up to 20 Projects -Magic Lasso -Super Ruler -Scale Triangle -Scale Protractor -Stencils -PDF Markup and Manager PRO SUBSCRIPTION FEATURES Also Includes -All Basic & Plus Features -Unlimited Projects -Folders -Perspective Tools -Maps to Scale -Smart Fill -AR Perspective Finder -AR SketchWalk -Sketch Over 3D Models -PSD Export ______________ SUBSCRIPTION INFO: One subscription gives you access to both your iPhone and iPad. Work like a PRO. Morpholio Trace subscription plans are available in the following options: •TracePlus •TracePro All payments are controlled and managed by Apple. If you are offered and activate a free trial, your Apple ID account will be charged only at the end of your free trial period for the subscription unless canceled at least one day before the end of the free trial period. Your Subscription will automatically renew and your Apple ID account will be charged unless your Subscription is cancelled at least 24-hours before the renewal date. No commitment. You can cancel your free trial as well as manage or cancel your Subscriptions at any time by going to your Apple ID account in the Apple Settings app. Privacy policy: http://www.morpholioapps.com/privacy/ Terms of use: http://www.morpholioapps.com/terms/ ______________ JOIN US: We would be thrilled to have Morpholio Trace be a part of your creative process. We hope you enjoy Trace and if there are any specific ways it could be improved for your use, please send us your feedback at https://www.morpholioapps.com/support/

apps.title: Decor Matters: Home Design App
apps.description: Looking to design and decorate your home with fun? Look no further than DecorMatters, the top-rated AI interior design and home decorating app that lets you unleash your creativity and home design skills with ease. Play Home Design Games and Earn Rewards • Play home decorating games and sharpen your skills while earning rewards and recognition. • Make it on the leaderboard, earn badges, and grow your design portfolio. • Host interior design fantasies, design challenges, and collect home design ideas and inspirations for your real rooms. Virtual Designing and AI Decorating at Your Fingertips • Use AI to experiment with different styles, layouts, and colors to create personalized home decorating ideas for every room in your house. • Decorate real rooms with our virtual design tools and visualize furniture and decorations in your floor plan. • Upload personal rooms and furniture to create unique interior design and decorating concepts and inspirations for your home. Shop Top Furniture Brands with Ease • Access millions of editable and shoppable home decor pieces from 30+ top furniture brands. • Augmented Reality (AR) view design ideas and home decor in your room before making a purchase to ensure it matches your floor plan and house style. • Save time and money by shopping for home decor and furniture in the app. Design Your Dream Home Today • Transform your house with our AI tools for home renovation and design inspiration. • Plan your entire home improvement project, from start to finish, with our intuitive DIY design functions and AI tools to make your house a home. • Use our app to guide you through the entire DIY home improvement process, from Pinterest inspirations to AR home decorating to furniture shopping. Join our vibrant community of interior design enthusiasts! Start your room makeover today with DecorMatters. Whether a peaceful bedroom or a stylish living room, we have everything you need to bring your interior design ideas to life. In-App-Purchases (IAP) Our app is FREE to download and offers in-app purchases to buy virtual coins and membership plans. These purchases unlock various items and exclusive features, enhancing your design experience. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account once the transaction is confirmed. Decor Matters Privacy Policy: https://decormatters.com/policy Decor Matters Terms of Use: https://decormatters.com/terms

apps.title: Houzz - Home Design & Remodel
apps.description: Houzz is the No. 1 app for improving and designing your home. Whether you’re building, remodeling or decorating, Houzz has you covered. Get the Best Home Design Ideas - Browse more than 25 million high-resolution photos of home interiors and exteriors. Choose by style, location or room, such as kitchen or bathroom. - Save and share home design photos with friends, family and home professionals. - Use the Sketch feature to annotate and draw directly on photos from Houzz. Find, View and Buy Products for Your Home - Shop from more than 5 million products and materials, including vanities, cabinets, lighting, furniture, tile and more. - Read verified product reviews. - Save up to 75% off during featured sales. - Use Visual Match, our visual recognition technology, to discover and buy products and materials directly from photos on Houzz. - Wondering what that sofa would look like in your living room? Select the View in My Room 3D feature and use the camera on your iPhone or iPad to see 3D products would look in your space. Find, Hire and Collaborate with the Best Home Professional for Your Project - Connect with over 3 million home improvement professionals, including architects, general contractors, interior decorators, repair professionals and more. Read Articles From Our Editorial Staff and Design Experts - Check out our biweekly Houzz Newsletter for engaging and informative articles, including home tours, full kitchen and bathroom remodeling guides, industry news, decorating tricks, organizing guides, designing for pets, gardening advice, humor and everything in between. - Watch Houzz TV to see original videos of inspiring homes, how-tos and more. Get Advice - Discuss home design and renovation topics in our Advice section and get feedback from the Houzz community on your projects and ideas. The Houzz app topped The New York Times list of “best apps for home improvement.” The Washington Post called Houzz the “single best source" for finding inspiration. CNN named it the “Wikipedia of interior and exterior design.” Use of the Houzz iOS App and the services provided through the Apps are subject to Houzz.com's terms of use: http://www.houzz.com/termsOfUse Please note the Houzz app is compatible with iOS 13.0 and above only.

apps.title: Sketchbook®
apps.description: From quick sketches to fully finished artwork, Sketchbook goes where your creativity takes you. Sketchbook is an award-winning sketching, painting, and drawing app for anyone who loves to draw. Artists and illustrators love Sketchbook for its professional-grade feature set and highly customizable tools. Everyone loves Sketchbook for its elegant interface and natural drawing experience, free of distractions so you can focus on capturing and expressing your ideas. • A full complement of brush types: pencils markers, airbrushes, smear and more that look and feel just like their physical counterparts • Brushes are highly customizable so you can create just the look you want • Guides, rulers and stroke tools support precision when you need it • Layers with a full complement of blend modes deliver the flexibility to build up and explore drawings and color • Purpose-built for sketching, the interface is clean and unobtrusive so you can focus on drawing Purchase the Premium Bundle to unlock more... • Import and export brushes • Create your own custom brushes • Additional color harmonies • Additional custom gradients • Select color from reference images • Extract color palettes from images • Import and export color palettes • Layer grouping • Layer masking Blend Modes • Export to PDF • plus more to come!

KEY FEATURES Inspiration at your fingertips: • Browse curated projects across 100s of creative fields, including graphic design, photography, illustration, 3D, art, and more. • Search for inspirational projects by specific tools, color, and more. • Build moodboards from projects that inspire you Hire freelancers and get hired: • Browse portfolios and hire talent for your freelance projects and pay artists safely and securely on platform • Edit your availability and let visitors know you’re open to new opportunities, and get paid directly on Behance • Send and receive private messages and files Connect with the community: • Follow artists and connect with a global network of creatives • Share your work and get feedback from the community Search millions of projects across creative fields and industry, including: Graphic Design Photography Illustration 3D art UI/UX Motion Graphics Architecture Product Design Fashion Advertising Fine Arts Crafts Game Design Sound Design and more! WHAT’S NEW We’ve improved features designed to help you get noticed by hirers and find new creative jobs. • Edit your availability to let visitors know you’re open to new opportunities • Create and send proposals to hirers and get paid directly on Behance • Share images, videos, and files through the Behance inbox • Connect and verify your social media accounts Download now to join a thriving community of creatives! apps.title: SketchUp - 3D Modeling
apps.description: Experience the world's leading 3D design platform with a free 7-day Go trial! Without a subscription, you can still view 3D projects for free. Go offers essential 3D design tools, including SketchUp for iPad and SketchUp for Web. Created for design enthusiasts, architects, interior designers, contractors, home remodelers, construction professionals, and set designers, our intuitive tools streamline the creative process, allowing you to effortlessly craft 3D models and visualize concepts. Whether you're planning a home renovation, designing interiors, or creating a detailed architectural model, SketchUp helps bring your visions to life through 3D design. Go Features: - Work seamlessly across devices: Create 3D models on your iPad and computer using SketchUp.com. - Generative AI Designs: Harness the power of AI to create stunning visuals for architectural and home designs. Generate images that inspire your creative process and support your design narrative. - Room Planner & Space Design: Experiment with different layouts and design options to find the perfect fit for your space. Model your space with designer fixtures and furniture. - Real-time, realistic visuals: Create stunning photorealistic visuals by integrating environments and customizable real-world materials. - Scan-to-Design: Use our 3D scanning feature to capture real-world spaces, which AI intelligently transforms and organizes into editable 3D models. - Augmented Reality (AR): Visualize your designs in the real world with our AR capabilities. - DWG Compatibility: Import and export DWG files seamlessly, ensuring compatibility with other CAD software. - Import real-world information: Import images to textures, satellite imagery, 3D terrain, 3D buildings, and location information to power your designs with real-world context. Why Go? - Architects & Contractors: Transform your architectural visions into reality with intuitive 3D modeling tools. Quickly visualize and iterate design concepts and present ideas to clients and stakeholders. - Interior Designers & Home Remodelers: Visualize your ideas in 3D and AR, ensuring your designs meet expectations. Use AI image generation to inspire additional finishes and layouts. - Landscape Designer: Plan and visualize outdoor spaces, from planters to parks, with our 3D landscape tools, like real-time shadow studies, geo-locating satellite imagery, and 3D terrain. - DIYer: Whether you're planning a small remodel or a complete home renovation, SketchUp provides the tools you need to design and execute your projects with confidence. Without a subscription: - Switch between perspective and orthographic camera views. - Control the visibility of parts of your model. - Adjust the look and feel of your model by controlling Edge and Face styles, Shadows, Hidden Geometry, Section Planes, and Section Cuts. - Take measurements and get information about edge lengths, the area of faces, the volume of solids, and component and group definitions. - View models in augmented reality. IMPORT/EXPORT -Import: SKP, SKE, SKM, HDR, EXR, PNG, JPG, PDF, DWG, DXF, STL -Export: Images (PNG), Animations (MP4), SKP, USDz, PDF, DWG, DXF, OBJ, STL, MP4 REQUIREMENTS Requires iOS 17 or higher with a minimum of 1024Mb of RAM. For additional info, please visit help.sketchup.com. The AR model viewing feature uses ARKit and is compatible with iPhone 6s and newer, iPad Pro, or any 2017 iPad or newer. SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS Create 3D designs with a free 7-day Go trial. Payment will be charged to your Apple Account on confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before your subscription expiration date. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before your subscription expiration date. After completing your initial purchase, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renew by visiting your Apple Account Settings.

raw_data.title: SketchUp - 3D Modeling
raw_data.release_note: Here's what's new in v7.2.1 This update includes minor improvements to Diffusion and bug fixes. Improvements • Users can now clear locally cached Trimble Connect files from their device, similar to iCloud's "remove download" option. The new “remove offline version” option is accessible via the overflow menu for Trimble Connect files in your recent files list. • Enlarged the tap area for the measurement box to include the entire box, allowing you to more easily tap into measurements. • Updated the Diffusion user survey to open an in-app window instead of a browser window Bug fixes • Fixed an issue where the measurements panel extended beyond the display when docked at the bottom of the screen • Fixed a crash that occurred when downloading 3D Warehouse models and then exiting the app before saving. • Fixed an issue where the rename command was absent from the overflow menu for files in the Trimble Connect Tab • Fixed a bug that caused a user with a newly created TID to not be able to see the upgrade screen Dive in and explore! Tell us what you think on the forum: https://forums.sketchup.com/c/sketchup-labs/sketchup-ipad/

apps.title: Brother P-touch Design&Print 2
apps.description: [Description] Let's create and print labels using your mobile device! P-touch Design&Print2 is a free application that enables you to design labels on your iOS device (iPhone/iPad*) and print them via Bluetooth® using your Brother label printer. * iPhone compatibility mode [Key Features] - Easily create stylish and practical labels, decorative tapes, and satin ribbons from a variety of templates perfect for all your labeling, crafting, storage, retail, business, and gift wrapping needs. - Choose from a wide variety of fonts, symbols, emoji, patterns, and frames to create and design labels, decorative tapes, and satin ribbons. - Insert images and logos and preview the final design before printing. - Insert QR codes using the "Share label" feature to share links to websites or videos. (P-touch CUBE XP and CUBE Plus only) [New Features in Brother P-touch Design&Print2] - Text Recognition: Scan and insert text without having to enter it manually. (P-touch CUBE XP and CUBE Plus only) - Cloud Storage: Upload label templates to the cloud, reuse them, and share them with others. -Translation Function: Automatically translate scanned or typed text and add it to your label. (P-touch CUBE XP and CUBE Plus only) [Compatible machines] P-touch CUBE XP, P-touch CUBE Plus, P-touch CUBE and PT-N25BT To help us improve the application, send your feedback to Feedback-mobile-apps-lm@brother.com. Please note that we may not be able to respond to individual emails.

apps.title: Zen Master: Design & Relax
apps.description: Have you ever thought about what your dream house would look like? Would you like to experience a match-three game and home design at the same time? Zen Master is a free puzzle and lifestyle game with unique levels that are easy to play, fun, and also challenging. Play through the levels for decorating your house and test your creative skills as you collect stars. All you have to do is combine at least three of the same gems at once, making clever moves until you reach the goal. When you complete the levels, you'll get various items that you can use to decorate your house and unlock your dream rooms. With this game, which combines the love of match-3 games and decoration in the same environment, you'll be able to renovate your house in the style you want. A cozy interior in soft colors and relaxing background music will help you feel comfortable and create a great interior design. Swap, combine, and decorate your home now.

raw_data.title: Zen Master: Design & Relax
raw_data.release_note: The update is here—exciting new features await! We’re back with another content-packed update this week. Check out the game now to discover fresh content—an exciting adventure awaits you!

apps.title: Morpholio Board - Moodboard
apps.description: DISCOVER, DESIGN, PRESENT Do you love interior design, style, branding or décor? Want to make stunning & smart moodboards from anywhere? Morpholio Board turns any homeowner, creative or design enthusiast into a Pro designer instantly. Whether you want to design a living room, renovate a new kitchen or simply get a nursery ready, Morpholio Board lets you create beautiful moodboards and then automatically turn them into design presentations, color charts, shopping lists, furniture books and much more. It's like having an entire design office in one app. ___________ THINGS YOU CAN DO: MAKE MOODBOARDS Create stunning, fast & smart design boards, material boards, furniture boards, fashion boards, graphic boards or branding boards using Moodboard Magic Tools. CURATED + CUSTOM LIBRARIES With top brand collections, curated galleries and your own personal library you can discover amazing products and organize your favorites any way you desire. Top brands include Knoll, Design Within Reach, Dyson, Porcelanosa, Herman Miller, Blu Dot, Rejuvenation, Tom Dixon, Kohler, Moooi, Uhuru, Ligne Roset and 100’s more AR FURNITURE Experience signature products in your space to scale with hyper-real details and finishes. The AR is “so real you just might trip over it.” WORK LIKE A PRO Use your moodboards to automatically generate spreadsheets, cutsheets, PSDs, PDFs, presentations and much more for use at work or with your teams. ___________ FREE FEATURES INCLUDE: -Up to 5 Projects -Pinterest Portal -Custom Grids* -AR Furniture -Shape Seed* -Color Seed* -Quick Text -Markup Tools -Curated Galleries -Image Export -Swatch Maker ESSENTIAL SUBSCRIPTION FEATURES -10 Projects Total -Moodboard Magic Tools -Color Palettes PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION FEATURES -20 Projects Total -Export to Excel, PDF or PSD -AR Color Capture* -Presentation Mode -Graphics & Entourage PRO SUBSCRIPTION FEATURES -Unlimited Projects -Smart Layers -Folders -Auto Shopping Lists -Auto Furniture Books -Your Personal Library * iPad Only Features ___________ SUBSCRIPTION INFO: One subscription can be accessed by your iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Work like a PRO. Morpholio Board subscription plans are available in the following options: •BoardEssentials •BoardPremium •BoardPro All payments are controlled and managed by Apple. If you are offered and activate a free trial, your Apple ID account will be charged only at the end of your free trial period for the subscription unless canceled at least one day before the end of the free trial period. Your Subscription will automatically renew and your Apple ID account will be charged unless your Subscription is cancelled at least 24-hours before the renewal date. No commitment. You can cancel your free trial as well as manage or cancel your Subscriptions at any time by going to your Apple ID account in the Apple Settings app. Privacy policy: http://www.morpholioapps.com/privacy/ Terms of use: http://www.morpholioapps.com/terms/ ___________ JOIN US: We would be thrilled to have Morpholio Board be a part of your creative process. We hope you enjoy Board and if there are any specific ways it could be improved for your use, please send us your feedback at morpholioapps.com/support.

apps.title: Havenly: Interior Design
apps.description: **Featured on Vogue, The New York Times, Harper's Bazaar, PopSugar, and Apartment Therapy, Havenly is the most delightful way to bring your dream home to life!** Take your dream from an idea to reality by matching with one of our talented interior designers. They’ll partner with you for one-on-one design help & hand-picked products tailored to your style, space and budget. Don’t have a vision? Not inspired enough? We let you browse real designs or create your own using our New Havenly AI chat feature to design your dream space. You can get started with our design style quiz to learn your unique interior design style! **IMAGINE YOUR DREAM SPACE** • Explore real rooms designed by our amazing Havenly interior designers • See fresh personalized design ideas at a glance with our widget • Take the Havenly style quiz and learn your unique interior design style **DESIGN WITH HAVENLY AI** • Bring your ideas to life by chatting with our new AI design assistant • Get instant inspiration, style guidance, and personalized room concepts **WORK WITH A DESIGN EXPERT** • Upgrade to a Havenly Mini, Full or In Person design package to start the design magic • Collab 1x1 with your designer to refresh a room, or transform your entire home • See your vision come to life with 3D renderings of your actual space **SHOP THE BEST OF HOME** • Get a curated shopping list with personalized furnishing and decor picks • Browse our catalog with hundreds of name brands, all with a best price guarantee • Shop all in one place and let our team handle the logistics Download the Havenly app to get inspired and reimagine your space today!

apps.title: My Lottery Dream Life
apps.description: Wanna live the fantasy life? Design luxurious properties for the recent lottery winners each new episode. Play My Lottery Dream Life today, an exciting and addictive game that allows you to live the life of an interior decorator. Start a new creative hobby! Play with home decor styles, express your creativity, and improve your design skills by creating amazing interior spaces for overnight billionaires! In My Lottery Dream Life, you get to make incredible choices by creating aesthetic designs, renovating homes, and seeing your clients' dreams come true. Have fun exploring impeccable designs in ultra-quality graphics. apps.title: Prêt à Template
apps.description: Bring your fashion ideas to life! Whether you're sketching your very first sketches or fine-tuning a professional portfolio, Prêt-à-Template gives you everything you need to design with confidence, speed, and style. Explore your creativity with tools that keep up with your flow, dive straight into designing with intuitive features and ready-made templates that help you stay focused on what matters most: expressing your unique vision! Look out what Prêt-à-Template have for you: 1,000+ Ready-to-Use Templates Bodies, garments, shoes, bags, accessories, and jewelry design—all with multiple views and proportions. No more blank pages—simply pick a template and start sketching! Puzzle Look Feature Mix and match outfits and accessories in a fun, interactive way. Create endless combinations to perfect every style. Intuitive Drawing Tools Enjoy realistic brushes, infinite layers, color fills, and vibrant fabric patterns. Adjust pen thickness, experiment with textures, and bring your designs to life—just like a real fashion illustrator. • Unlimited Layers & Smart Organization – Easily rearrange, group, and merge layers. • Minimalist UI – A sleek, user-friendly interface keeps your creativity flowing. New to fashion sketching? Learn with step-by-step tutorials, master proportions, and refine your croquis. Already a pro? Elevate your portfolio with advanced layering techniques and custom patterns. Moodblog & Inspiration Hub Stay inspired with curated mood boards and trend updates. Explore different styles—from streetwear to haute couture—and keep your designs fresh. Collaboration & Syncing • iCloud Sync – Seamlessly work across devices. • Apple Pencil Support – Sketch with precision using Apple Pencil on iPad. From delicate details to bold patterns, every stroke feels natural and professional. Who Is Prêt-à-Template For? • Aspiring Designers – Gain confidence and refine your style. • Students & Educators – A perfect tool for fashion schools and workshops. • Professional Creatives – Conceptualize collections faster with organized layers and realistic brushes. • Fashion Enthusiasts – No experience? No problem! User-friendly tools make designing effortless. Make Your Fashion Dreams Come True Design stunning garments, layer intricate patterns, and bring your vision to life—all on your device. Once finished, export and share your designs on social media or collaborate with friends. Ready to Start Creating? Download now and try it free for 7 days—no commitments, cancel anytime. Subscription Pricing & Terms Prêt-à-Template is free to download with limited features. Unlock full access with a yearly or monthly subscription. Auto-renews unless canceled 24 hours before the current period ends. Manage your subscription in your Apple Account settings. Privacy Policy: pretatemplate.com/privacy-policy Terms of Use: pretatemplate.com/terms-of-use Get started today and make your mark on the fashion world—one sketch at a time!

apps.title: Interior Story:Decorating Home
apps.description: Write your own Interior Story! Embody your dream designs and play a breathtaking match 3 game! Open a new decor page and create your own style with “Interior Story”! Enter the world where dreams about an ideal home come true! You will turn into reality the ideas of different clients, from student to business woman. Introduce various styles ideas from classic to hi-tech. Choose furniture and accessories and decorate them according to the room style so that it could reflect your individuality. Do you need inspiration? Play exciting match 3 game to open more interior items! Get unique furniture and accessories to make the room you decorate look fancier and cosier! With “Interior Story” you will have much fun: - create interiors for different rooms (from living room to bathroom) in various styles according to your clients’ wishes! - express your individuality in thousands of design elements and embody your personal style! - enjoy interesting and bright characters! - play an incredible match 3 game with more than 1000 levels and several gaming modes. Take your challenge! - get regular updates with the new furniture and match 3 levels! - take your favourite game to play everywhere, even offline! Try yourself as a designer and turn old houses into masterpieces of the modern interior! Design your dream house in your personal style with “Interior Story”!

Whether you’re designing a photo post, video ad, event invitation, or animated story — Andalusi brings powerful tools and cultural authenticity to your fingertips. Everything You Need in One App Design Photos and Videos Together • Add text, stickers, logos, and elements to both images and videos • Apply filters, overlays, and animations directly on video content • Combine multiple media types in a single scene or story • Export your creations as high-quality images or videos (including transparent PNG) Arabic-Focused Text Tools • Add Arabic and English text with full RTL (right-to-left) support • Curve Arabic text with precise angle and spacing control • Fill your text with images, gradients, or metallic textures • Customize font, size, spacing, line National Days, graduation, real estate, business, fashion, sports, and quotes • New templates added daily Animation & Motion Design Tools • Animate any element (text, sticker, image, or video) • Use preset animations: Fade, Zoom, Slide, Bounce, Dissolve, Loop, and more • Timeline editor to control when each layer appears and disappears • Perfect for social videos, animated stories, and content reels Layers & Visual Control • Work with unlimited layers just like in professional design tools • Show, hide, lock, and reorder elements for clean compositions Photo & Element Editing Tools • Erase parts of any photo or text with the masking tool • Crop, rotate, resize, and flip photos • Apply handpicked photo filters and overlays with adjustable intensity • Choose from gradients, solid backgrounds, or transparent exports • Remove background instantly with AI-powered background remover — works on people, objects, and product photos with a single tap Stickers & Creative Elements • apps.description: ArcSite is the perfect design tool for all levels—from beginners sketching out floor plans to experienced designers taking on complex projects. apps.title: Word villas - Crossword&Design
apps.description: Design your dream home with Word Villas! This game is the perfect combination of Word Puzzles and Home Decorating. Start your adventure by helping Rachel renovate her old house and start a new life! Solve challenging word puzzles to renovate and decorate the various rooms and areas in the house. Fix up what's already there, redesign to give new lift, and choose from impressive options! Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Interact with many vivid characters and unlock an addictive story involving new friends, romance, adventure, and drama! What makes Word Villas so special? ● Unique gameplay: a combination of word puzzles and home decorating provides a relaxing and enjoyable gaming experience. ● Home design: - Use your design skills and creativity to renovate and decorate the house with various styles and themes; - Make your own choice from hundreds of unique furniture and decor. - Explore the house and unlock more areas for renovation. ● Exciting word puzzles: - Simply swipe the letters to build words to collect rewards! - Challenge yourself with different Modes, including Normal, Hard and Expert. - Thousands of unique levels await, and more are being added! ● Fun characters and a story full of twists: - Say goodbye to the past mess, start a new life! Establish and expand your own B&B business. - Make friends and experience a new life, all while restoring the old mansion. Will romance bloom? Will you find your true love? What are you waiting for? Solve challenging word puzzles, unleash your creativity, and start your makeover now! Love Word Villas? Follow us on Facebook to stay up-to-date on Word Villas news, contests, polls and other fun stuff: https://www.facebook.com/WordVillas/

apps.title: Bazaart AI Photo Editor Design
apps.description: Bazaart is an easy-to-use AI photo editor, video editor, and design app. No design background needed. Create fast for online selling, digital marketing, and social media. Get your design superpowers today! What you can make For your business: Product photos, home listings, model shots, profile pics, logos, flyers, ads, posters. For your social media: Reels, TikTok videos, stories, posts, slideshows, thumbnails, stop motion videos. For your everyday life: Collages, cards, invitations, memes, WhatsApp stickers, backgrounds, wallpapers, GIFs, works of art. AI tools • Edit with AI: change or replace anything in a photo with simple prompts • Remove background: background remover for photos and videos • Remove: remove objects and people from any photo • Magic Background: create on-brand, AI-generated scenes for products and portraits • AI Image: turn text prompts into images • AI Restyle: restyle photos in one tap (from product try-ons to creative looks) • Magic Edit: select an area and replace it using a prompt • Enhance: improve photo quality in a tap • Expand: extend your photos to any size • Lift: cut the subject from the background, move and resize it Photo and video editing tools • Cut out with crop, scissors, eraser, and shape cut-out • Adjust exposure, contrast, saturation, vibrance, warmth, tint, shadows, highlights, fade, sharpness, and blur • Make elements stand out with outlines and shadows • Combine photos and videos with blending modes • Batch edit to speed through multiple photos • Blur background of any photo for a portrait look Design tools • Create in custom sizes and popular presets • Sketch and draw freely • Curve text on arcs and circles • Style text with quick presets • Fine-tune text alignment, letter spacing, and line spacing • Auto-snapping for perfect alignment • Nudge tool for precise positioning • Work with layers; every change is reversible • Organize projects into folders • Save projects to the cloud to keep them in sync Content that speeds you up • Beautiful templates made by designers • Thousands of backgrounds, graphics, shapes, and animated graphics • Photo and video effects • Large font library, plus add your own • Use photos and videos from albums, camera, files, or stock Export and share • Save images as JPG or PNG with transparency • Save videos or animated GIFs • Save as PDF • Share anywhere Upgrade your design experience Bazaart Premium Access to all tools and content, higher usage of AI tools, save without watermark, and VIP support. Bazaart Super (perfect for small businesses) Everything in Premium, plus maximum usage of AI tools and 100 GB of cloud storage. Terms of Service: https://www.bazaart.com/terms Privacy Policy: https://www.bazaart.com/terms/#privacy Need help? Email support@bazaart.com and we’ll get back to you quickly. BAZAART is a registered trademark of Bazaart Ltd.

apps.title: iScape: Landscape Design
apps.description: iScape is the No. 1 app for landscape design. We are here to help you create beautiful outdoor living areas. Whether you’re an Industry Professional, or a DIY Homeowner, iScape has you covered. As featured in Forbes, HGTV, HBO, The New York Times, USA Today, Fox, and many more! “If you’re DIY’ing it, iScape makes it easy to plan out what to buy and how to put it all together. If you’re hiring a landscaper, the app can help you explore ideas and share your vision.” - Forbes "It is user friendly and has features that include a virtual pen, the ability to insert objects and more. This is considered one of the best landscape design apps." - Borst Landscape Design "Wish you could see how your home would look with professional landscaping? With iScape, you can create a digital model of your home's yard. Feature your favorite plants, so you can see the design before digging at all." - HGTV Check out just some of the great iScape benefits: Landscape Business Tools - iScape pro subscription provides the ability to create a proposal directly from the app in real time. Whip up a design, output a proposal, set pricing, modify descriptions and create a professional PDF with your quote and custom business info in minutes! Visualize the Finished Project - Whether you’re going to do-it-yourself or hire a pro to help, you’ll know how it should look before the project even starts. Design in Your Own Space - Seamlessly blend your physical and digital living spaces using augmented reality (3D) or traditional designs (2D). Share with Others - Collaborate with a landscape pro, your customers or your spouse and use iScape to share your vision and make it a reality. Complete the Project - We inventory all the products and items within your iScape design to make purchasing smooth and easy. Around the globe, more than 5 million designs have been created with iScape helping both Industry Professionals and Homeowners save time, energy and money. What else is the world saying about iScape? “If you’re looking to tackle a landscaping project, check out iScape, which allows you to overlay virtual flowerbeds, trees and shrubs on top of photos of your home so that you can test out your landscaping ideas before you ever head to the garden supply store.” - Fox News “To plan the perfect patch, look no further than iScape.” - Wall Street Journal “If you’re looking to ramp up your curb appeal, we recommend the iScape app to create virtual landscaping." - The Washington Post “When you’re planning a new garden or considering a change to an established one, it can be difficult to visualize the results. This is where iScape comes in handy.” - The NY Times AUTOMATIC-RENEWAL DETAILS FOR SUBSCRIPTIONS: • Subscriptions are managed in user Account Settings after purchase. • Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account. • Cancel renewal anytime. Subscription automatically renews unless cancelled at least 24-hours prior to period end. • Account will be charged for renewal for the same subscription you purchased within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. • No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. • Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription. Privacy Policy: https://iscapeit.com/privacy Terms: https://www.iscapeit.com/terms We really hope that you enjoy iScape. We are continuously striving to make the experience better and better. Please do not hesitate to contact us with any feedback and/or questions at support@iscapeit.com. User input has made a tremendous impact at iScape and we greatly appreciate it!

apps.title: Home AI - AI Interior Design
apps.description: Easily redesign your home in a variety of stunning styles using advanced AI technology.​​ Home AI brings the expertise of an interior designer right into your pocket! Simply take or upload a photo of the room and space you wish to redesign, choose a style, and receive instant interior design alternatives with unparalleled detail and accuracy. Whether you aim to modernize your living room, add a touch of elegance to your bedroom, or completely revamp your kitchen, Home AI has got you covered. Whether you're an existing homeowner looking for a fresh new look, or a real estate agent staging the perfect property, our app is your ideal design partner. Home AI is here to serve as your personal AI interior design assistant, transforming your space in real time and providing personalized interior designs tailored specifically for your space. 【Effortless Interior Design at Your Fingertips】 Instant Room Makeover: Take a picture of any room in your house, and Home AI's advanced AI technology will instantly generate stunning interior design concepts tailored to your space. Witness the magic unfold as your vision comes to life before your eyes, with every detail thoughtfully optimized. A World of Interior Design Styles: Unleash your inner decorator with our extensive library of over 10 diverse interior design styles. From the sleek minimalism of modern interior design to the calming serenity of a zen aesthetic, Home AI caters to every taste. Experiment with various styles, mix and match elements, and discover the perfect look that reflects your unique personality. AI-Powered Recommendations that Go Beyond Style: Home AI doesn't just suggest a new look; it provides insightful recommendations on furniture, decor, and color schemes that perfectly complement your chosen style. Create a harmonious and cohesive space that feels truly lived-in. 【More Than Just Visualization:】 Save and Share Your Concepts: Capture and store your favorite interior design concepts for future reference. Share your transformed spaces with friends, family, or even professional interior designers to gather valuable feedback and refine your vision. Collaborate effortlessly and bring your design dreams to life. Find Inspiration from Endless Possibilities: Home AI acts as your personal interior design muse, offering endless inspiration to spark your creativity. Explore different concepts and experiment with various styles to find the perfect balance that reflects your unique taste and elevates your space. 【Home AI is the ultimate tool for anyone who wants to:】 Effortlessly visualize interior design ideas and see their dream home come to life Explore a vast library of interior design styles and discover their perfect aesthetic Refresh a single room or plan a complete home makeover with ease Collaborate with friends, family, and professionals to create a personalized space Spark their creativity and find endless interior design inspiration Download Home AI today and unlock a world of interior design possibilities! Reimagine your space, redefine your style, and create the home of your dreams with the power of cutting-edge AI technology. By using the app, you confirm that you acknowledge and accept our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use: Privacy Policy: https://homeinterior.ai/privacy Terms of Service: https://homeinterior.ai/terms Do you have a question for us? info@homeinterior.ai

apps.title: Hotel Craze® Design Makeover
apps.description: Want to be the hotel tycoon? Get yourself into this real hotel & cooking madness life, feel grand hotel mania in Hotel Craze & Cooking Frenzy. You will be able to open hotels all over the world, cook delicious food, get likes from your guests and upgrade your hotels to get more love and recognition. People around the world love vacation, cooking. They travel for adventure or pleasure, and they will need the relaxing coffee time after one long day. It is time for you to run luxury hotels, build up your grand hotel team and show people the best hotel service and enjoy the cooking hot. Let's write the doorman story now and be the crazy chef! Dash from hotel to hotel in our wonderful map. You can unlock more places as you progress in this time-management game. Build up your hotel team and attract more and more guests. Let the Hotel Craze start now! Everyone loves the hotel which has delicious food. Of course you could cook all kinds of dishes for your guests. Pizza, Hamburger, Coffee, Green tea... Whatever they want! Practice your management skills, tap as fast as you can to fulfill guests' requests. Operating hotels has never been so exciting! Try different appliances to complete your game task, upgrade kitchenwares to get the best gaming experience. The elegant environment is needed for our hotel. Get more and more money from hotel service, spend them on hotel upgrades. One high-end hotel can not only earn more money but also attract more guests all over the world. Collect their likes and be the best starred hotels. What more Fun things bring to this game? - Enjoy your craze time in more than 1000 hotel levels! - Travel & open the worldwide hotels among different cultures! - Be ready for your guests' whims and serve them in time! - Cook all kinds of yummy food to satisfy your guests! - Collect likes, earn more and more love and recognize! - Upgrade your hotels! Operate high-end hotels and earn more money! - The Booster system makes your game time more fancy! - Don't forget to join our game task and events to get massive rewards! What kind of hotel will you get? A little motel with hamburgers and drinks? Or one luxury hotel with an elegant environment? Now it is time to write your own hotel story.

apps.title: Hover - measure, design, quote
apps.description: The one app to scope and sell every construction project. All your trades. All your people. All in one place. Contractors, adjusters, and homeowners trust Hover to get the job done. For Construction Pros: Measure everything. Get detailed, to-the-inch accurate exterior and interior home measurements from just 8 smartphone photos or by uploading a blueprint plan. No measuring tape or tracing required. For roof area, roof pitch, roof area, siding, soffits, eaves, fascia, trim, gutters, windows, doors, and more. Document anything. Easily and consistently capture project notes, annotations, and photos at any point during the job. Leverage detailed templates covering inspections, liability, punchlists, team hand-offs, and more—or create your own custom templates. Design to sell. From inspiration tools powered by AI to interactive 3D home models, all from photos or a blueprint upload. Visualize your projects, the products you sell, share it with anyone, or export it as a BIM file for other applications. And when you’re ready, add all the final touches like landscaping with photo-realistic rendered home designs. Takeoffs in two clicks. Generate ready-to-order Material Lists directly from Hover's measurements. Access over a hundred customizable building material templates, built by industry experts and from the most trusted brands, to generate complete Material Lists—without number crunching or manual data entry. You can mix materials, trades, and even submit building material orders digitally to your local supplier. For Homeowners: Working with an insurance company? Hover helps streamline your underwriting or claims process. Want to remodel or redesign your home? Find inspiration with Hover’s free home design tools to see what your potential project will look like ahead of time. Works for both exterior and interior remodeling projects. Hover can help you design and build your dream home. Questions? Get in touch anytime: support@hover.to

apps.title: Logo Maker - Logo Design Shop
apps.description: Logo Maker - Logo design shop lets you create a stunning logo for your business in seconds, even if you have no design skills. Logo Maker allows you to create logo, icons, symbols, watermark, business card or any type of professional design like poster, banner, flyer and ads design. Design creative, modern, artistic and professional logos for your business or personal use. Logo Maker is the fast and easiest app ever to create beautiful logo. Simply choose from over 1500+ customizable creative logo templates created by our professional designers. Then edit your chosen design using more than 600 fonts, icons, symbol and background design resources. You can create vintage logo, watercolor logo, retro style logo, artistic logo, abstract logo, designer logo and much more. The best part of this app is that you don’t need any design experience. Just pick a template and get creative! • 1500+ READY TO USE LOGO TEMPLATES Logo Maker provides you a variety of fully editable and customizable logo templates. Each logo design is fully adjustable and customizable. So, you can make awesome logo in minutes. The logo collection is categorized with popular themes like Animals, Business, Vintage, Retro, Luxury, Iconic, Basic, Sports, Watercolor, Letter based, Typography, Abstract, Art, Natural & Organic, Gym, Fitness, Yoga, Badges, Food & Drinks, Beauty & Fashion, Music, Education, Restaurant, Nature, Automative, Real Estate and much more. • 8500+ GRAPHICS (ICONS, SYMBOLS & FONTS) Logo Maker has over 8500+ design resources, including icons, modern fonts, symbols, shapes and HD backgrounds. All the graphics are carefully selected by our professional designers. The graphics & icons collection is categorized with popular themes like Birds & Animals, Gradient, Floral, Watercolour & Golden Paint Stains, Nature, Sports, Foods, Alphabets, Grunge Shapes, Colorful, Science & Technology, Ribbons, Shield, Geometric, Entertainment, Fruits & Vegetables, Real Estate and much more. • PROFESSIONAL DESIGN TOOLS You can design creative and pixel perfect logos with the help of different design tools like text adjustment, stroke, size, color, smart mask(erase), curve and nudge(move). • SAVE YOUR LOGOS Logo maker allows you to save your logo designs or work. So you can edit them anytime anywhere. • HIGH-RESOLUTION LOGO Save and share your logos as transparent PNG or JPEG images or Export as a PDF. Transparent PNG images can be saved up to 4000 x 4000 resolution. SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS: Logo Maker is free to download. Upgrade to Logo Maker Pro for unlimited access to premium content for $6.99/month. • Prices may vary by region and are converted to local currency.• Subscriptions auto-renew unless turned off 24 hours before the end of the current period.• Manage subscriptions in your iTunes account settings. Start your free trial today and unlock the full potential of Logo Maker!
